db:abstract.db:para: The Maze example demonstrates the TiltSensor QML type.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = maze QT += quick sensors SOURCES = main.cpp
OTHER_FILES = \ components \ $$files(*.qml) \ $$files(*.js) \ content \ android/AndroidManifest.xml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/sensors/maze INSTALLS += target
RESOURCES += \ maze.qrc
ANDROID_PACKAGE_SOURCE_DIR = $$PWD/android
